mps module¶

class mps.Mps(L, name='None')[source]¶

Bases: object

Class for matrix product states (MPS).

Every state can be expressed as: .. math:

| \Psi \rangle = \sum_{i_1, i_2, \cdot, i_L} A^{i_1} A^{i_2}
\cdot A^{i_{j-1}} M^{i_j} B^{i_{j+1}} \cdot B^{i_L} | i_1 i_2
\cdot i_L \rangle.
L¶

int – length of the MPS.

D¶

int – maximum bond dimension.

A¶

array list – left canonical tensors that define the MPS at each site.

B¶

array list – right canonical tensors that define the MPS at each site.

M¶

array list – mixed canonical tensors at each site.

truncate(D_new)[source]¶

Truncate the MPS to a maximum bond dimension D_new.

Parameters:D_new (int) – maximum bond dimension of the truncated MPS.
